summary.span: 表示实现内存中缓存的类型。

span.span: Represents the type that implements an in-memory cache.
This type is thread safe.

span.span: Note It is not required for configuration information to exist for every name.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 初始化类时，它将检查可能已使用构造函数中的可选参数重写的配置项 `config` 。When the class is initialized, it checks for configuration entries that might have been overridden by using the optional `config` parameter in the constructor. 可以在参数中传递以下参数 `config` 。You can pass the following parameters in the `config` parameter. 所有值都可以作为整数传递。All values can be passed as integers. - - - 调用此构造函数时，将首先从应用程序配置文件中检索配置设置。When this constructor is invoked, configuration settings are first retrieved from application configuration files. 如果应用程序配置文件中不存在任何配置项，则仅应用中提供的设置 `config` 。If no configuration entries exist in the application configuration file, only the settings provided in `config` are applied. 如果应用程序配置中存在配置条目，并且还传入了信息 `config` ，则中的信息会 `config` 重写从配置文件中读取的信息。If the configuration entries in the application configuration exist, and if information is also passed in `config`, the information in the `config` overrides the information that is read from the configuration file. 分配给缓存实例的名称值通过两种方式使用：The name value that is assigned to a cache instance is used in two ways: - 当存在多个实例时，帮助您跟踪多个缓存实例。To help you keep track of multiple cache instances when more than one instance exists. - 在初始化实例时引用配置文件中的设置 。To reference settings in the configuration file when the instance is initialized. > [!NOTE] > 没有任何机制来强制缓存实例的唯一名称。There is no mechanism to enforce unique names for cache instances. 因此，可以有多个具有相同名称的缓存实例。Therefore, it is possible to have multiple cache instances with the same name. > [!CAUTION] > 除非需要，否则不要创建 实例。Do not create instances unless it is required. 如果在客户端和 Web 应用程序中创建缓存实例，则 应在应用程序生命周期的早期创建实例。If you create cache instances in client and Web applications, the instances should be created early in the application life cycle. 必须仅创建将在应用程序中使用的缓存实例数，并将对缓存实例的引用存储在可全局访问的变量中。You must create only the number of cache instances that will be used in your application, and store references to the cache instances in variables that can be accessed globally. 例如，在 ASP.NET 应用程序中，可以将引用存储在应用程序状态中。For example, in ASP.NET applications, you can store the references in application state. 如果只在应用程序中创建一个缓存实例， 则在需要访问缓存时，请使用默认缓存并从属性获取对该实例的引用。If you create only a single cache instance in your application, use the default cache and get a reference to it from the property when you need to access the cache.

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache as a instance, and adds details about how the entry should be evicted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 和 方法重载不支持 属性。The and method overloads do not support the property. 因此，若要设置缓存项的 属性，请改用 方法重载。Therefore, to set the property for a cache entry, use the method overloads instead.

summary.span: 将某个缓存项插入缓存中。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载用于将缓存项插入缓存中。The method overloads are used to insert a cache entry into the cache. 如果具有匹配键的缓存项不存在，则这些方法将插入一个新项。If a cache entry with a matching key does not exist, these methods insert a new entry. 如果已存在具有匹配键的缓存项，则它们将返回现有的项。If a cache entry with a matching key already exists, they return the existing entry.

span.span: If a cache entry with the same key exists, the existing cache entry; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `item`参数提供方法所使用的键和值。The `item` parameter supplies the key and the value that is used by the method. 如果缓存中的缓存项与参数的键具有相同的键 `item` ，则该方法将现有项作为 实例返回。If the cache has a cache entry with the same key as the key of the `item` parameter, the method returns the existing entry as a instance. 如果没有现有缓存项，该方法将使用参数提供的键和值 `item` 以及指定的逐出详细信息创建一个新的 `policy` 。If there is no existing cache entry, the method creates a new one by using the key and value supplied by the `item` parameter, and with the eviction details specified by `policy`. > [!WARNING] > 和 方法重载不支持 属性。The and method overloads do not support the property. 因此，若要设置缓存项的 属性，请改用 方法重载。Therefore, to set the property for a cache entry, use the method overloads instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果缓存中没有与参数匹配的缓存项 `key` ，则将创建一个新的缓存条目，并且 方法重载将返回 `null` 。If the cache does not have a cache entry whose key matches the `key` parameter, a new cache entry is created, and the method overload returns `null`. 如果存在匹配的缓存项，则返回现有的项。If a matching cache entry exists, the existing entry is returned. > [!WARNING] > 和 方法重载不支持 属性。The and method overloads do not support the property. 因此，若要设置缓存项的 属性，请改用 方法重载。Therefore, to set the property for a cache entry, use the method overloads instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public long CacheMemoryLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 CacheMemoryLimit
Public ReadOnly Property CacheMemoryLimit As Long
public: property long CacheMemoryLimit { long get(); };
member this.CacheMemoryLimit : int64

summary.span: 获取计算机上缓存可使用的内存量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the amount of memory on the computer, in bytes, that can be used by the cache.
The amount of memory in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果缓存的当前实例超出了由属性设置的内存限制 ，则缓存实现将删除缓存条目。If the current instance of the cache exceeds the limit on memory set by the property, the cache implementation removes cache entries. 应用程序中的每个缓存实例都可以使用由属性指定的内存量 。Each cache instance in the application can use the amount of memory that is specified by the property. 可以在应用程序配置文件中指定属性的设置。The settings for the property can be specified in the application configuration file. 此外，还可以在初始化类时在构造函数中传递它们 。Alternatively, they can be passed in the constructor when the class is initialized. 有关如何配置此属性的详细信息，请参阅[ < namedCaches > 元素 (缓存设置) ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings)。For more information about how to configure this property, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings). 有关如何在初始化类时设置此值的详细信息 ，请参阅 方法。For more information about how to set this value when the class is being initialized, see the method. 每次将新项添加到实例时，不会立即强制执行 。 does not instantly enforce each time a new item is added to a instance. 内部试探法（逐出中的附加项）从垃圾回收器中进行额外的项操作 ，并将信息从垃圾回收器中考虑 (参阅 [垃圾](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/) 回收) 和其他因素（如当前缓存大小和整体系统内存压力）。The internal heuristics which evicts extra items from the does it gradually and takes into account information from the garbage collector (see [Garbage Collection](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/)) and other factors such as current cache size and overall system memory pressure. 因此，即使 尝试在已配置的中保留缓存大小，也可以 通过以非常高的速率添加缓存项来暂时超出限制。Therefore even though the tries to keep the cache size within the configured it is possible to temporarily exceed the limit by adding cache items at a very high rate.

span.span: <namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)

returns.span: 用于监视缓存中的项的更改监视器。

span.span: A change monitor that monitors entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个 实例。The method creates a instance. 此专用更改监视器用于监视集合中指定的缓存项， `keys` 并在项发生更改时触发事件。This specialized change monitor is used to monitor the cache entries that are specified in the `keys` collection and to trigger events when the entries change. 监视的条目出于以下任何原因而被视为已更改：A monitored entry is considered to have changed for any of the following reasons: - 调用方法时，该键不存在 。The key does not exist at the time of the call to the method. 在这种情况下，生成的 实例将立即设置为已更改状态。In that case, the resulting instance is immediately set to a changed state. 这意味着，当代码随后绑定更改通知回调时，将立即触发回调。This means that when code subsequently binds a change-notification callback, the callback is triggered immediately. - 关联的缓存项已从缓存中移除。The associated cache entry was removed from the cache. 如果该项已显式删除（如果该项过期，或被逐出恢复内存），则可能会发生这种情况。This can occur if the entry is explicitly removed, if it expires, or if it is evicted to recover memory

exception.span: 不是 。

span.span: is not .

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取对默认 实例的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the default instance.
The default instance of the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性始终返回对默认缓存实例的引用。This property always returns a reference to the default cache instance. 对于典型的应用程序方案，只需要一个实例 。For typical application scenarios, only one instance of is required. 因为默认缓存实例不是由构造函数创建的，所以必须使用配置来显式设置默认缓存实例的内存和轮询值。Because the default cache instance is not created by the constructor, you must use configuration to explicitly set the memory and polling values for the default cache instance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ < memoryCache > 元素 (缓存设置) ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings)。For more information, see [<memoryCache> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/memorycache-element-cache-settings).

span.span: <memoryCache> Element (Cache Settings)

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 实例都绑定到 事件。Each instance is bound to the event. 但是，在应用程序域关闭期间，如果基于内存的缓存尚未显式释放，则缓存实例会自动调用 方法。However, during application-domain shutdown, if a memory-based cache has not been explicitly disposed, the cache instance will automatically call the method. 已释放的缓存实例将使用以下步骤关闭：The disposed cache instance is shut down using the following steps: 1. 缓存的状态设置为指示缓存已释放。The state of the cache is set to indicate that the cache is disposed. 尝试调用将更改缓存状态的公共缓存方法（例如添加、删除或检索缓存条目的方法）时，可能会导致意外的行为。Any attempt to call public caching methods that change the state of the cache, such as methods that add, remove, or retrieve cache entries, might cause unexpected behavior. 例如，如果在 释放缓存后调用方法，则不会发生 op 错误。For example, if you call the method after the cache is disposed, a no-op error occurs. 如果尝试从缓存中检索项，则该 方法将始终返回 `null` 。If you attempt to retrieve items from the cache, the method will always return `null`. 2. 不再从当前缓存实例中引发性能计数器信息。Performance counter information is no longer raised from the current cache instance. 3. 释放对当前缓存实例所包含的缓存对象的所有引用。All references to cached objects held by the current cache instance are released. 4. 将 通知当前正在监视缓存中的条目的任何实例。Any instances that are currently monitoring entries in the cache are notified. 5. 将调用为这些监视器提供更改通知的回调对象。Callback objects that provide notification of changes for those monitors are called. 6. 向缓存中的条目注册的任何实例都将被调用。Any instances that are registered with entries in the cache are called. 传递给回调的删除原因为 。The removal reason that is passed to the callbacks is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回类的单个实例可使用的物理计算机总内存的百分比 。The property returns the percentage of total physical computer memory that can be used by a single instance of the class. 如果缓存实例超过指定的限制，则会删除缓存项。If the cache instance exceeds the specified limit, cache entries are removed. 可以在应用程序配置文件中指定属性的设置。The settings for the property can be specified in the application configuration file. 或者，在初始化类时，调用方可以传递它们 。Alternatively, they can be passed by a caller when the class is initialized. 有关如何配置此属性的详细信息，请参阅[ < namedCaches > 元素 (缓存设置) ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings)。For more information about how to configure this property, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings). 有关如何在初始化类时配置属性的详细信息 ，请参阅 方法。For more information about how to configure the property when the class is being initialized, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他 方法重载一样， 方法始终将缓存值放在缓存中，而不考虑是否已存在具有相同键的项。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether an entry already exists that has the same key. 如果缓存中不存在指定的条目，则插入新的缓存条目。If the specified entry does not exist in the cache, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果指定的项已存在，则将更新其值。If the specified entry already exists, its value is updated.

summary.span: 使用键和值将某个缓存项插入缓存中，并指定基于时间的过期详细信息。

span.span: Inserts a cache entry into the cache by using a key and a value and specifies time-based expiration details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他 方法重载一样， 方法始终将缓存值放在缓存中，而不考虑是否已存在具有相同键的项。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether an entry already exists with the same key. 如果指定的项不存在，则插入一个新的缓存项。If the specified entry does not exist, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果指定的项存在，则将更新该项。If the specified entry exists, it is updated. `absoluteExpiration`参数指示应从缓存中删除项的时间。The `absoluteExpiration` parameter indicates when the entry should be removed from the cache. 删除某个条目会触发任何关联的更改监视器。Removing an entry triggers any associated change monitors. 如果移除的项与 对象或 对象关联，则传递到回调的删除原因将包含在 属性中。If the removed item was associated with a object or object, the reason for removal that is passed to the callbacks is contained in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他 方法重载一样， 方法始终将缓存值放在缓存中，而不考虑匹配项是否已存在。Like other method overloads, the method always puts a cache value in the cache, regardless whether a matching entry already exists. 如果缓存中不存在指定的条目，则插入新的缓存条目。If the specified entry does not exist in the cache, a new cache entry is inserted. 如果指定的项存在，则将更新该项。If the specified entry exists, it is updated. 删除某个条目会触发任何关联的更改监视器。Removing an entry triggers any associated change monitors. 如果移除的项与 对象或 对象关联，则传递到回调的删除原因将包含在 属性中。If the removed item was associated with a object or object, the reason for removal that is passed to the callbacks is contained in the property.

span.span: Provides support for iteration over a generic collection.

span.span: The enumerator object that provides access to the entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为接口时使用 。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface. 您可以使用此方法循环访问缓存项的泛型集合。You can use this method to iterate through a generic collection of cache entries.

MemberSignature.Value: public long Trim (int percent);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 Trim(int32 percent) cil managed
Public Function Trim (percent As Integer) As Long
public: long Trim(int percent);
member this.Trim : int -> int64

param.name: percent
param.span: 要移除的缓存项总数的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of total cache entries to remove.

summary.span: 从缓存对象中移除指定百分比的缓存项。

span.span: Removes a specified percentage of cache entries from the cache object.
The number of entries removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性首先删除超出绝对或可调过期的条目。The property first removes entries that have exceeded either an absolute or sliding expiration. 为删除的项注册的任何回调都将被传递，原因是 。Any callbacks that are registered for items that are removed will be passed a removed reason of . 如果删除过期条目不足以达到指定的剪裁百分比，则将根据最近最少使用 (LRU) 算法从缓存中删除其他条目，直到达到请求的剪裁百分比。If removing expired entries is insufficient to reach the specified trim percentage, additional entries will be removed from the cache based on a least-recently used (LRU) algorithm until the requested trim percentage is reached. 为以这种方式删除的项注册的任何回调都将被传递删除原因 。Any callbacks that are registered for items that are removed this way will be passed a remove reason of .
